Shipping Charges

ParkerPen US ships to the 48 contiguous states. We do not ship to P.O. Boxes, APO or FPO addresses.

Depending on the product(s) being purchased, your order will be delivered via FedEx Ground for smaller items, or a common LTL truck carrier for larger items (See surcharge information below).

Your order may be shipped from one or more of our warehouses for faster service. You can expect to receive a shipment confirmation email, complete with tracking information, when your purchase has left our warehouse.

Expect delivery to arrive within 7-10 business days. For larger items, our common truck carriers will use the Delivery Contact Number provided during the Checkout process to schedule a delivery appointment, if required.

** Please note that the carrier, for larger items shipped, may charge you a storage fee if delivery is not completed within 48 hours. The carrier is contracted to deliver only to the curbside of your address, and cannot provide inside delivery (over the threshold) as part of their service. For this reason, especially for oversized items, we recommend that you have help available to move the item to its final location.

Orders placed before 12:00 p.m. ET will ship the same business day. Orders placed at or after 12:00 p.m. ET will ship within 24 hours on business days. Orders are only shipped on business days. Business days are Monday through Friday excluding federal holidays in the United States.
